H0.text: a country having an island location and a country having continental location. Japan

H1.text: a country having an island location and a country having continental location. United Kingdom

H2.text: a country having an island location and a country having continental location. Iceland

H3.text: a country having an island location and a country having continental location. Australia

A4.text: Australia is sometimes considered the world's largest island and is often dubbed the 'island continent'.

A5.text: the mainland is the world's smallest continent and the country is the sixth-largest by total area.
